entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:18 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
